{{Han compound|尸|比|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p|t1=body}}. A word which understandably appears late in the literature.

===Etymology===
From {{inh|zh|sit-pro|*pja-n/t/s||fart; shit}}. Cognate with {{cog|bo|ཕྱེན}}, {{m|bo|འཕྱེན||flatulence}}, {{cog|kac|hpyet||to fart}}.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} [[flatulence]]; [[fart]]
#: {{zh-x|放屁|to fart; to bullshit}}
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} [[buttock]]s; [[backside]]
#: {{zh-x|馬屁|horse's backside; flattery}}
#: {{zh-x|狗屁|dog's backside; nonsense; worthless thing}}
#: {{zh-x|屁眼|anus; asshole}}
# {{lb|zh|colloquial}} to [[fart]]; to [[pass gas]]
#: {{zh-x|屁者先知|[jocular] The farter is usually the first to realise (and complain about the fart).}}
# {{lb|zh|vulgar}} [[rubbish]]; [[worthless]]; [[useless]]; [[insignificant]]; [[trivial]]
#: {{zh-x|屁話|nonsense}}
#: {{zh-x|屁事|'''trivial''' thing}}
# {{lb|zh|vulgar|usually in the negative}} a [[damn]] [[thing]]; (no)[[thing]]
#: {{zh-x|他 屁 都 不是。|He is an absolute no'''body'''.}}
#: {{zh-x|你 懂-個屁！|You don't know a '''damn thing'''!}}
# {{lb|zh|vulgar}} {{n-g|Negates the meaning of the sentence.}}
#: {{zh-x|你 有 屁 用！|You are '''fucking''' use'''less'''!}}
